customer_addr:
1650 NW 66TH AVENUE BUILDING SUITE 206
MIAMI, FL 33122

citations.narrative:
On November 17, 2023, a Veterinary Medical Officer performed a routine inspection and determined that the airline has
been transporting animals in the cargo area of the aircraft without a valid registration. Each carrier and intermediate
handler not required to be licensed under section 3 of the Act and the regulations, shall register with the Secretary by
completing and filing a properly executed form. The form shall be filed with the Deputy Administrator for the State in which
the registrant has his or her principal place of business, and shall be updated every 3 years by the completion and filing of
a new registration form.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.25(a) 
   
Requirements and procedures. 
On November 17, 2023, a Veterinary Medical Officer performed a routine inspection and determined that the airline has 
been transporting animals in the cargo area of the aircraft without a valid registration. Each carrier and intermediate 
handler not required to be licensed under section 3 of the Act and the regulations, shall register with the Secretary by 
completing and filing a properly executed form. The form shall be filed with the Deputy Administrator for the State in which 
the registrant has his or her principal place of business, and shall be updated every 3 years by the completion and filing of 
a new registration form. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
